# Really Secure Algorithm (150)

### Description
> I like my e's like I like my trucks: big and obnoxious

### File
* [reallysecure.txt](./File/reallysecure.txt)

### Tool
* [factordb.com](http://factordb.com/index.php?)

### Solution
1. According to the title's name and the content of reallysecure.txt, it's rsa
2. Use factordb.com to factor the given number n
3. Get p and q and follow the algorithm of rsa to decrypt the cipher text
4. Notice that the value of p and the value of q are same, so $\phi(n) = p*(q-1) \neq (p-1)*(q-1)$

### Flag
```
DawgCTF{sm@ll_d_b1g_dr3am5}
```
